search_input: “[How the use of digital technologies] reshapes the relationship between resources such as image and writ-ing, and has the potential to significantly reconfigure notions of spatiality and embodiment as well as genre conventions, all of which can lead to adapted and some new types of texts and interactions.” (Jewitt, 2013, p. 270) (pdf)
suggested_query: By examining the affordances of WIPTe, this research aims to explore how the technology enables users to reorganize the spatial relationships between words and images, potentially leading to novel forms of multimodal communication. Furthermore, the study will investigate how WIPTe's unique interface influences the ways in which users engage with and make sense of the digital text, shedding light on the complex interplay between author, text, and technology.
